jobs.title: Staff, Data Engineer (Ads Ops Data Support)
jobs.description:
Staff, Data Engineer (Ads Ops Data Support)

쿠팡은 고객 만족을 실현하기 위해 존재합니다. 고객들이 “쿠팡 없이 어떻게 살았을까?”라고 물을 때, 쿠팡은 주어진 사명을 이루어 가고 있다는 확신을 가집니다. 쇼핑과 식사를 비롯한 고객들의 라이프스타일 전반을 보다 편리하게 만들겠다는 단 하나의 목표에 전념하며, 쿠팡은 수백만 달러 규모의 이커머스 산업 전체의 혁신을 선도하고 있습니다. 쿠팡은 가장 빠른 속도로 성장을 이루고 있는 이커머스 기업 중 하나로, 국내 커머스 시장에서 독보적인 위치를 점하며 고객들로부터 두터운 신뢰를 얻고 있습니다.
쿠팡은 세계적인 대형 상장 기업임에도 스타트업의 유연한 문화를 유지하고 있다는 점에 자부심을 느낍니다. 스타트업 문화는 쿠팡이 설립 당시 지니고 있었던 민첩함을 계속 유지하며 끊임없이 새로운 서비스를 출시하고 사업을 확장할 수 있도록 하는 쿠팡의 성장 동력입니다. 쿠팡의 모든 직원들에게는 사업가 정신을 가지고 새로운 혁신과 이니셔티브를 좇을 기회가 주어집니다. 업무에 뛰어들어 결과를 만들어내는 대담함은 쿠팡이 일하는 방식의 본질입니다. 쿠팡에서 여러분은 자기 자신과 동료들, 팀, 그리고 회사 전체가 날마다 성장하는 모습을 보게 될 것입니다.
쿠팡의 모든 직원들은 커머스의 미래를 구축한다는 쿠팡의 사명을 다하기 위해 헌신하고 있습니다. 우리는 고객의 어려움을 해결하고, 통념과 관습에 도전하며, 가능성의 한계를 확장합니다. 항상 깨어 있는 최첨단의 초연결 하이테크 환경에서 놀라운 업무 경험을 쌓기 원한다면, 지금 쿠팡에 합류하세요.
직무 소개 :
Coupang Ads는 쿠팡 내 광고 플랫폼 팀입니다. 플랫폼에서 상품을 판매하는 판매자를 위한 광고 솔루션을 제공하는 데 집중하는 글로벌 팀이며, 여기에는 디스플레이, 검색, 퍼포먼스, 브랜드 및 동영상 광고 상품이 포함됩니다.
해당 포지션은 Ads Ops Data Support 팀의 일원으로서 근무하게 됩니다. Ads Ops Data Support 팀은 쿠팡 광고 비즈니스의 매출을 극대화할 수 있도록 정확하고 활용 가능한 데이터를 제공합니다. 우리는 데이터 분석가(DA), 데이터 사이언티스트(DS), 일반 사용자들이 데이터를 쉽게 활용할 수 있도록 광고 데이터를 수집하고 관리하는 데이터 파이프라인을 운영합니다. 또한 DA와 DS가 셀프 서비스 방식으로 데이터 파이프라인을 관리할 수 있도록 지원합니다.
이 과정에서 기업 인프라 팀과 데이터 플랫폼 팀과 긴밀히 협력하여 서버와 Git 저장소를 관리합니다. 데이터 거버넌스를 통해 데이터 무결성을 강화하고, 데이터 계보(Data Lineage)를 구현하여 사용자가 필요한 데이터를 쉽게 찾을 수 있도록 합니다. 궁극적으로는 AI가 축적된 데이터를 학습해 사용자가 쿼리 생성과 최적화를 자동화할 수 있는 환경을 구축하는 것이 우리의 목표입니다.
업무 내용 :
Coupang Ads의 Staff, Data Engineer로서 담당하게 될 주요 업무는 다음과 같습니다.
- 기술 전문가 역할 수행: 깊은 지식과 경험을 바탕으로 팀에 기술적 영향력을 발휘하고, 생산성과 효율성을 높이기 위해 전문성을 공유
- Ads 비즈니스 조직의 비즈니스 분석가 및 데이터 사이언티스트와 협업: 데이터 요구사항을 파악하고, 비즈니스 성장을 이끄는 핵심 KPI를 정의하며, 소스 데이터 제공자가 주요 속성을 기록하도록 영향력을 행사
- 핵심 비즈니스 도메인(광고, 재무, Salesforce 시스템 등)에 대한 기본 데이터 모델 정의
- 대규모 데이터 처리 기술(Hive, Spark, Streaming, Presto 등)을 활용해 안정적이고 확장 가능한 데이터 파이프라인 설계 및 구축
- 문서 보존 검토 및 컴플라이언스 모니터링을 위한 종합 프레임워크 개발, 구현 및 운영
- 데이터 플랫폼 팀과 협력하여 Airflow 저장소 환경을 설정하고 Operator 개발
- AWS 기반 데이터 계보(Data Lineage) 서버 환경 구성 및 백엔드 처리 작업 수행
자격 요건:
- 학사 이상 (컴퓨터공학, 엔지니어링 등 관련 전공)
- 10년 이상의 실무 경력
- SQL에 대한 깊은 이해
- Python, NodeJS 또는 기타 소프트웨어 엔지니어링 언어 숙련
- CI/CD 경험 (CircleCI 또는 유사 tool)
- 프로덕션 환경에서의 Kubernetes/Docker 운영 경험
- Kubernetes 기반 시스템 운영 및 모니터링 2년 이상
- Hive, Spark, Presto 활용 경험
- 데이터 파이프라인 또는 ETL tool (예: Airflow) 사용 경험
- 빠른 조직 환경에서 다수의 프로젝트를 동시에 관리할 수 있는 능력
우대  사항:  
- 데이터 시각화 tool 활용 경험 (예: Tableau, Qlik, Looker, Power BI)
- 머신러닝 또는 AI 프로그래밍 경험
- AdTech, 광고, 디지털 마케팅, 광고 대행사 또는 관련 도메인 경험
- 석사 학위
채용절차 및 안내사항
- 전형절차  
- 서류전형 - 전화면접 -대면면접 – 최종 합격   
- 전형절차는 직무별로 다르게 운영될 수 있으며, 일정 및 상황에 따라 변동될 수 있습니다. 
- 전형일정 및 결과는 지원서에 등록하신 이메일로 개별 안내드립니다. 
- 참고사항  
- 본 공고는 모집 완료 시 조기 마감될 수 있습니다.   
- 지원서 내용 중 허위사실이 있는 경우에는 합격이 취소될 수 있습니다. 
- 취업   보호   대상자 ( 보훈대상자 ,   장애인   등 ) 는   관련   법률에   따라   채용우대를   받을   수   있습니다 .
- 개인정보 처리방침
- 쿠팡그룹은 입사지원자 개인정보 처리방침(아래 링크)에 따라 귀하의 개인정보를 수집하여 처리합니다. 
- https://rocketyourcareer.kr.coupang.com/privacy-policy  
- 서류반환 정책  
- 본 고지는 『채용절차의공정화에 관한 법률』 제11조 제6항에 따른 것입니다. 
- 당사 채용에 응시한 구직자 중최종 합격이 되지 못한 구직자는 『채용절차의 공정화에 관한 법률』에 따라 제출한 채용서류의 반환을 청구할 수 있음을 알려 드립니다. 다만, 홈페이지 또는 전자우편으로 제출된 경우나 구직자가 당사의 요구 없이 자발적으로 제출한 경우에는 그러하지 아니하며, 천재지변이나 그 밖에 당사에게 책임 없는 사유로 채용서류가 멸실된 경우에는 반환한 것으로 봅니다. 
- 위2항 본문에 따라 채용서류 반환 청구를 하는 구직자는 채용서류 반환청구서 [채용절차의 공정화에 관한 법률 시행규칙 별지 제3호 서식]를 작성하여 당사 이메일( recruitingops@coupang.com )로 제출하면, 제출이 확인된 날로부터 14일 이내에 지정한 주소지로 등기우편을 통하여 발송해 드립니다. 이 경우 등기우편요금은 수신자 부담으로 하게 되오니 유념하시기 바랍니다. 
- 당사는 위2항 본문에 따른 구직자의 반환 청구에 대비하여 채용 여부가 확정된 날로부터 180일간 구직자가 제출한 채용서류 원본을 보관하게 되며, 그때까지 채용서류의 반환을 청구하지 아니할 경우에는 『개인정보 보호법』에 따라 지체 없이 채용서류 일체를 파기할 예정입니다.
- 채용 및 업무 수행과 관련하여 요구되는 법령상 자격이 갖추어지지 않은 경우 채용이 제한될 수 있습니다.

jobs.title: Sr. Staff, Back-end Engineer (Growth Engineering)
Senior Staff End User Computing & Mobility System Engineer (Global Operations IT)
jobs.description:
Senior Staff End User Computing & Mobility System Engineer (Global Operations IT)

Company Introduction
We exist to wow our customers. We know we’re doing the right thing when we hear our customers say, “How did I ever live without Coupang?” Born out of an obsession to make shopping, eating, and living easier than ever, we are collectively disrupting the multi-billion-dollar commerce industry from the ground up and establishing an unparalleled reputation for being leading and reliable force in South Korean commerce.
We are proud to have the best of both worlds — a startup culture with the resources of a large global public company. This fuels us to continue our growth and launch new services at the speed we have been since our inception. We are all entrepreneurs surrounded by opportunities to drive new initiatives and innovations. At our core, we are bold and ambitious people that like to get our hands dirty and make a hands-on impact. At Coupang, you will see yourself, your colleagues, your team, and the company grow every day.
Our mission to build the future of commerce is real. We push the boundaries of what’s possible to solve problems and break traditional tradeoffs. Join Coupang now to create an epic experience in this always-on, high-tech, and hyper-connected world.
 
Job Overview 
We are seeking an experienced Senior Staff Engineer to lead the support and introduction of new IT technologies for End User Computing (PDA, Systems, Network, Linux, Thin client, Client engineering) in our Fulfillment Operations. The ideal candidate will have a strong technical background, leadership skills, and experience in managing technology operations for e-commerce or retail companies. Experienced in E-Commerce with minimum 5 Years of experience in launching buildings , managing IT Infrastructure and adopting new Global standards and introducing new technology.
Responsible for endpoint IT hardware, end-user services, the introduction of new technology, and innovative solutions for Coupang’s Fulfillment Centers and Logistic Centers operations, in alignment with the business objectives of the organization. The End User Services Staff Engineer will provide technical expertise and leadership to end-user services IT staff, on the Network and System Engineering L1/L2 support enablement and maintenance of endpoint IT hardware, networks, client technologies, business applications. Should lead analysis, problem-solving, and project management for new business and IT initiatives. This person will be directly responsible for Asset Management, Service Desk L1/L2 Support and FC Client Engineering through Technology enablement.
What You Will Do
- Support and introduce new IT technologies for End User Computing, including PDA, Systems, Network, Linux, Thin client, and Client engineering.
- Lead the launch and management of Warehouse technology operations, including automation and robotics.
- Manage people without authority, influencing and guiding cross-functional teams to achieve technology goals.
- Troubleshoot and resolve complex technical issues in System engineering, Networks, and End User Computing.
- Launch and manage remote support, zero-touch deployment, and automation initiatives.
- Analyze data for asset management, MDM management, client engineering tool, and automation.
- Lead the migration of Windows to Linux and Chrome to Linux for highly flexible and reliable system deployments.
- Launch and manage remote deployment of end-user computing solutions.
- Develop and manage monitoring systems and dashboards for end-user devices.
- Drive efficiency generation projects and Kaizens for Warehouse operations.
Basic Qualifications
- Minimum 6 years of experience in supporting and introducing new IT technologies for End User Computing in an e-commerce or retail company.
- Total experience of 15-20 years in IT technology, with a focus on Fulfillment Operations.
- Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related f

jobs.title: Staff Backend Engineer
jobs.description:
Staff Backend Engineer

We exist to wow our customers. We know we’re doing the right thing when we hear our customers say, “How did we ever live without Coupang?” Born out of an obsession to make shopping, eating, and living easier than ever, we’re collectively disrupting the multi-billion-dollar e-commerce industry from the ground up. We are one of the fastest-growing e-commerce companies that established an unparalleled reputation for being a dominant and reliable force in South Korean commerce.
We are proud to have the best of both worlds — a startup culture with the resources of a large global public company. This fuels us to continue our growth and launch new services at the speed we have been since our inception. We are all entrepreneurs surrounded by opportunities to drive new initiatives and innovations. At our core, we are bold and ambitious people that like to get our hands dirty and make a hands-on impact. At Coupang, you will see yourself, your colleagues, your team, and the company grow every day.
Our mission to build the future of commerce is real. We push the boundaries of what’s possible to solve problems and break traditional tradeoffs. Join Coupang now to create an epic experience in this always-on, high-tech, and hyper-connected world.
Role Overview
As a Staff Software Engineer in Messaging and Streaming Platform team, you will be responsible for designing and building solid infrastructure to construct, monitor and manage blaze-fast and consistent messaging, notification and streaming pipelines. Your core mission is to provide company-wide and generic messaging, notification and streaming solutions with super high scalability, reliability and availability to unleash the productivity of Customer teams. You will have significant scope, impact and responsibility in shaping the future of messaging platform at Coupang. You will be working in a friendly, synergistic, passionate and sharp team.
- MSP team develops and supports Coupang company-wide messaging, notification and streaming infrastructure.
- MSP team constructs, monitors and manages blaze-fast and consistent messaging pipelines.
- We provide company-wide and generic messaging, notification and streaming solutions with super high scalability, reliability and availability to unleash the productivity of Customer teams.
- MSP team has significant scope, impact and responsibility in shaping the future of messaging platform at Coupang.
- MSP team is a friendly, synergistic, passionate and sharp team.
What You Will Do
- Architect and build Coupang's Messaging, Notification and Streaming platform.
- Write durable code with the ability to process tera-bytes and peta-bytes each day.
- Keep improving our platform stability, performance and achieving 99.99% to 99.999% availability with smooth operations.
- Work closely with Coupang internal and external Customers and wow them with our cutting-edging products.
Minimum Qualifications
- BS or advanced degree in Computer Science/Engineering, Information Systems or a closely related technical field
- 8 years of experience in designing, developing and maintaining large-scale software infrastructures
- Proficiency in Java
- Experience working in cloud environments, particularly AWS
- Demonstrated experience in building and maintaining highly available, distributed systems
Preferred Qualifications
- Solid (AWS) cloud background on both software development and operations
- Expertise in distributed systems and computing frameworks like Kafka, Spark, etc.
- Team player and fast learner with the ability to quickly triage and troubleshoot complex problems
- Strong ownership and be passionate about applying new technologies to real products
  Pay & Benefits
Our compensation reflects the cost of living across several US geographic markets. At Coupang, your base pay is one part of your total compensation. The base pay for this position ranges from $138,000/year in our lowest geographic market to $297,000/year in our highe

jobs.title: Senior Android Engineer
jobs.description:
Senior Android Engineer

Company Introduction
We exist to wow our customers. We know we’re doing the right thing when we hear our customers say, “How did we ever live without Coupang?” Born out of an obsession to make shopping, eating, and living easier than ever, we’re collectively disrupting the multi-billion-dollar e-commerce industry from the ground up. We are one of the fastest-growing e-commerce companies that established an unparalleled reputation for being a dominant and reliable force in South Korean commerce.
From the moment a customer opens the Coupang app to the moment a product is delivered to their doorstep, Coupang is reinventing the shopping experience to delight each and every customer. With a world-class end-to-end e-commerce and logistics network, and a customer-obsessed culture, Coupang has refused to compromise on speed, selection, or price. Today, Coupang has achieved a groundbreaking innovation: delivering millions of products, including fresh groceries, nationwide within just a few hours, 365 days a year. All of this is part of Coupang’s commitment to millions of customers in Korea—one of the largest and fastest-growing e-commerce markets in the world.
Role Overview
Since its launch in 2019, Coupang Eats has achieved remarkable growth in the highly competitive delivery market. As a multi-sided platform serving consumers, merchants, and delivery partners, Coupang Eats provides innovative experiences and services. Leveraging Coupang’s advanced technology and operational expertise, Coupang Eats has built a fast-paced, proactive startup culture. Team members—including product owners, operations, and engineers—collaborate to solve problems with the goal of continuous customer satisfaction.
What You Will Do
- Develop new features for the Coupang Eats app
- Improve app performance for faster and more reliable user experiences
- Build reusable and scalable common modules
- Collaborate closely with Product, UX, and Backend teams to deliver high-quality projects
 
Basic Qualifications
- Bachelors or Masters in a relevant engineering domain
- 5+ years of Android app development experience
- Solid understanding of the Android platform and Kotlin
- Strong problem-solving skills
- Clear communication skills and a sense of ownership
Preferred Qualifications
- Experience in O2O or e-commerce domains
- Experience with Compose, Coroutines, and unit test development
Type of work model  
- Hybrid
Details to consider  
- Those eligible for employment protection (recipients of veteran’s benefits, the disabled, etc.) may receive preferential treatment for employment in accordance with applicable laws. 
 
Privacy Notice    
- Your personal information will be collected and managed by Coupang as stated in the Application Privacy Notice located below. https://privacy.coupang.com/en/land/jobs/
